Class Hourly

    • ADO
      • Hourly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hourly
extends ADO
implements java.io.Serializable
    CS2212 6_TheWeather Hourly.java This class represents the object for weather in 3 hour intervals
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      double temp,

      double max,
      int humid,
      java.lang.String windDir,
      java.lang.String sky,
      javax.swing.ImageIcon state)
        Constructor for the hourly weather object
        Parameters:
        air - the air pressure for the weather object
        wind - the wind speed for the weather object
        temp - the current temperature for the weather object
        min - the minimum temperature for the weather object
        max - the maximum temperature for the weather object
        humid - the humidity for the weather object
        windDir - the wind direction for the weather object
        sky - the sky condition fo the weather object
        state - the image that goes along with the associated sky condition
